dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 456 IH: Protecting Dogs Subjected to Experiments Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Steube introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To prohibit the provision of Federal funds to the National Institutes of Health for the purposes of conducting biological, medical, or behavioral research involving the testing of dogs.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Protecting Dogs Subjected to Experiments Act.

section.header: Prohibition on use of Federal funds by National Institutes of Health for certain research involving the testing of dogs
section.text: No Federal funds made available to the National Institutes of Health may be used for the purposes of conducting biological, medical, or behavioral research involving the testing of dogs.
